Description: Papyrus written with black ink with legal document dated month of Mesore of year 16 of Ptolemy III Euergetes I. 7 ll. on recto and list of 16 witnesses on verso. Cession of highland at Armant: Pasherpamut the elder son of Psenamounis cedes land to Espmethis son of Ouaphres. Scribe Herieus son of Harsiesis. On recto, vestiges of other 6 ll. from an earlier text (palimpsest): list of goods belonging to a marriage document.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1990a / Catalogue of Demotic Papyri in the British Museum IV: Ptolemaic Legal Texts from the Theban Area (p.102-4, pl.89-90, 94)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (2727) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/2727)
